result.eng: She was lying on the ground.
result.ga: Bhí sí ina luí ar an talamh
result.orig: Bhí sí ina luí ar an talamh
result.html: Bhí sí ina luí ar an talamhShe was lying on the ground.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí ina luí ar an talaṁShe was lying on the ground.

result.eng: I went to bed late at night.
result.ga: Chuaigh mé a luí déanach san oíche
result.orig: Chuaigh mé a luí déanach san oíche
result.html: Chuaigh mé a luí déanach san oícheI went to bed late at night.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ mé a luí déanaċ san oíċeI went to bed late at night.

result.eng: We stayed lying on the beach for a while.
result.ga: D'fhan muid inár luí ar an trá ar feadh píosa
result.orig: D'fhan muid inár luí ar an trá ar feadh píosa
result.html: D'fhan muid inár luí ar an trá ar feadh píosaWe stayed lying on the beach for a while.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan muid inár luí ar an trá ar feaḋ píosaWe stayed lying on the beach for a while.

result.eng: I found him lying on the floor.
result.ga: Fuair mé é agus é ina luí ar an urlár
result.orig: Fuair mé é agus é ina luí ar an urlár
result.html: Fuair mé é agus é ina luí ar an urlárI found him lying on the floor.
result.ponchtml: Fuair mé é agus é ina luí ar an urlárI found him lying on the floor.

result.eng: I love to go there and lie under the sun when the weather is good.
result.ga: Is breá liom dul ansin agus luí faoin ngrian nuair a bhíonn an aimsir go maith
result.orig: Is breá liom dul ansin agus luí faoin ngrian nuair a bhíonn an aimsir go maith
result.html: Is breá liom dul ansin agus luí faoin ngrian nuair a bhíonn an aimsir go maithI love to go there and lie under the sun when the weather is good.
result.ponchtml: Is breá liom dul ansin agus luí faoin ngrian nuair a ḃíonn an aimsir go maiṫI love to go there and lie under the sun when the weather is good.

result.eng: The hills looked dark and lonely with a cloud of fog lying on the top of the mountain.
result.ga: Bhí dreach dorcha uaigneach ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar bharr an tsléibhe
result.orig: Bhí dreach dorcha uaigneach ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar bharr an tsléibhe
result.html: Bhí dreach dorcha uaigneach ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar bharr an tsléibheThe hills looked dark and lonely with a cloud of fog lying on the top of the mountain.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí dreaċ dorċa uaigneaċ ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar ḃarr an tsléiḃeThe hills looked dark and lonely with a cloud of fog lying on the top of the mountain.

result.eng: The children went to bed but were not sleepy.
result.ga: Chuaigh na páistí a luí ach ní raibh fonn codlata orthu
result.orig: Chuaigh na páistí a luí ach ní raibh fonn codlata orthu
result.html: Chuaigh na páistí a luí ach ní raibh fonn codlata orthuThe children went to bed but were not sleepy.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ na páistí a luí aċ ní raiḃ fonn codlata orṫuThe children went to bed but were not sleepy.

result.eng: Off to bed with the lot of you!
result.html: Greadaigí libh a luíOff to bed with the lot of you!
result.ponchtml: Greadaigí liḃ a luíOff to bed with the lot of you!

result.eng: He would have to go to sleep on an empty stomach.
result.ga: B'éigean dó luí ar phutóga folmha go maidin
result.orig: B'éigean dó luí ar phutóga folmha go maidin
result.html: B'éigean dó luí ar phutóga folmha go maidinHe would have to go to sleep on an empty stomach.
result.ponchtml: B'éigean dó luí ar ṗutóga folṁa go maidinHe would have to go to sleep on an empty stomach.
